Articles.Content: When playing games I prefer the movement layout AEDF instead of AWSD.  I have had to change a few other bindings as a result.  Plus some things I don't use very often but might need.  A mod I would like to see is one that shows on screen your keyboard and what each button does using an icon or small text.  It can change based on context.
This would also help me right now where some keys are not working in the editor.
